content: sts repeat 9 & 10 until 2 sts remain 11 ws knit 12 rs ssk cut yarn pull yarn through the last stitch leaving a small loop and tie a knot to fasten trunk of tree with us 6 4mm needles or needles required for yarn and using the colour for the trunk of the tree with the rs facing up starting 8 sts in at the bottom of the tree pick up and knit 4 sts 1 ws knit repeat row 1 for 5 more row casting off on the last row which will be a rs cut yarn and fasten_off weave in all ends repeat the above steps to make as many trees as needed for the garland i made four trees © 2024 bluebird pine
